auth.no_biometrics: Biometric authentication is not available on this device.

permission.mic_request_message: Microphone access is required for voice recognition.

navigationHelp.title: Navigation Guide
navigationHelp.description: With SmartVision’s navigation feature, users can safely reach their destination. It provides route guidance and voice instructions.

settingsHelp.title: Additional Settings
settingsHelp.description: With SmartVision's various settings features, you can enjoy a personalized service experience. Supports theme change, notification settings, and more.

guardianHelp.title: Guardian Registration
guardianHelp.description: By entering the user’s unique code, guardians can receive location info and emergency alerts.
